mapper.insert: INSERT INTO item (category_id, name, image, description, price, status, grade, manufacture_country, is_best_seller, is_new, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{categoryId}, #{name}, #{image}, #{description}, #{price}, #{status}, #{grade}, #{manufactureCountry}, #{isBestSeller}, #{isNew}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE item SET category_id = #{categoryId}, name = #{name}, image = #{image}, description = #{description}, price = #{price}, status = #{status}, grade = #{grade}, manufacture_country = #{manufactureCountry}, is_best_seller = #{isBestSeller}, is_new = #{isNew}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE item_id = #{itemId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM item WHERE is_best_seller = true
SELECT * FROM item WHERE is_new = true
